metadata.name: Cathedral of Circuits - Complete Mystical Dataset
metadata.description: Complete multi-dimensional integration system for mystical, scientific, artistic, and technological frameworks
metadata.author: Rebecca Respawn

merkaba_chariot.name: Sphere of Infinite Potential
merkaba_chariot.description: A translucent, ever-shifting sphere that contains all possibilities simultaneously. Appears as a soap bubble that reflects infinite realities.
merkaba_chariot.transport_power: Can leap to any realm, timeline, or dimension instantly

powers.teaching_focus: How to embrace the unknown with courage

merkaba_chariot.name: Wand of Manifestation
merkaba_chariot.description: A crystalline wand that transforms thought into reality through focused intention. Crackling with electrical energy and surrounded by the four elements.
merkaba_chariot.transport_power: Create new worlds and realities through will

powers.teaching_focus: How to align will with cosmic law

merkaba_chariot.name: Veil of Mysteries
merkaba_chariot.description: A shimmering veil that reveals and conceals simultaneously. Made of moonlight and shadow, it shows truth to those ready to receive it.
merkaba_chariot.transport_power: Navigate through veils between worlds using intuition

powers.teaching_focus: How to listen to the voice of intuition

merkaba_chariot.name: Garden of Creation
merkaba_chariot.description: A floating garden of infinite beauty where all creative projects take root and bloom. Surrounded by butterflies and flowing with the waters of inspiration.
merkaba_chariot.transport_power: Nurture and manifest creative projects across realms

powers.teaching_focus: How to create with love and natural rhythm

merkaba_chariot.name: Throne of Order
merkaba_chariot.description: A crystalline throne that imposes divine order wherever it travels. Built from living geometry and powered by righteous authority.
merkaba_chariot.transport_power: Establish structure and order in chaotic realms
merkaba_chariot.sacred_geometry: Perfect cube with golden ratio proportions

powers.teaching_focus: How to build lasting structures with divine proportion

merkaba_chariot.name: Bridge of Wisdom
merkaba_chariot.description: A golden bridge that connects earth to heaven, tradition to innovation. Adorned with the symbols of all mystery schools throughout time.
merkaba_chariot.transport_power: Transmit sacred teachings across time and space

powers.teaching_focus: How to honor tradition while embracing evolution

merkaba_chariot.name: Lightning of Awakening
merkaba_chariot.description: A crackling bolt of divine lightning that shatters all illusions instantly. Painful but ultimately liberating, it clears the way for truth.
merkaba_chariot.transport_power: Breakthrough any false reality via sudden shock
merkaba_chariot.sacred_geometry: Zigzag lightning pattern with破碎 geometries

powers.teaching_focus: How to embrace necessary destruction for growth

merkaba_chariot.name: Waters of Hope
merkaba_chariot.description: A flowing fountain of starlight that nourishes all dreams and aspirations. Fed by celestial streams from the most distant stars.
merkaba_chariot.transport_power: Inspire hope and vision across all realms

powers.teaching_focus: How to maintain hope and vision in dark times

merkaba_chariot.name: Cosmic Dance
merkaba_chariot.description: The eternal dance of creation and destruction, held within a perfect mandala. Contains all of existence in perfect, harmonious motion.
merkaba_chariot.transport_power: Access any point in the cosmic cycle of existence

powers.teaching_focus: How to integrate all experiences into cosmic wholeness

storyBeats: A call to adventure through flames

symbolism.geometricPattern: Sacred geometries, angelic forms, divine patterns

gameDesign.environmentEffect: Completes all effects, masters all elements, integrates everything

meta.name: Complete Quality Guardian Registry
meta.description: All 144+ nodes configured as quality guardians and creative generators

quality_criteria.magic_preservation: Does this maintain sense of wonder?
quality_criteria.beginner_friendly: Can a complete newcomer understand this?
quality_criteria.overwhelm_check: Is this appropriately paced and not overwhelming?

quality_criteria.emotional_safety: Is this emotionally safe for vulnerable users?
quality_criteria.healing_support: Does this support healing rather than re-traumatizing?
quality_criteria.protective_energy: Does this feel protective and containing?
quality_criteria.gentle_progression: Does this allow for gentle, self-paced healing?

quality_criteria.technical_perfection: Does this work flawlessly under all conditions?
quality_criteria.performance_optimization: Is this optimized for best performance?
quality_criteria.code_elegance: Is the underlying code clean and maintainable?
quality_criteria.accessibility_compliance: Does this meet all accessibility standards?

creative_process.creation_method: Start with foundational structure, build layer by layer
creative_process.quality_enhancement: Ensures structural soundness and navigational clarity

creative_process.creation_method: Find universal patterns, create bridges between concepts
creative_process.quality_enhancement: Ensures crystal clear communication across all barriers

00_fool.name: The Fool - Infinite Potential
00_fool.team_role: Ensures every experience maintains beginner's mind magic

01_magician.name: The Magician - Manifested Will
01_magician.team_role: Ensures all technical aspects manifest user intention perfectly

art_direction.interaction_style: Direct response to user will and intention

21_world.name: The World - Perfect Completion
21_world.team_role: Ensures every system feels complete and perfectly integrated

art_direction.interaction_style: Recognition of accomplishment and invitation to new cycles

cups_suit.team_philosophy: All content must touch the heart and support emotional well-being

wands_suit.team_philosophy: All content must spark creativity and inspire action

swords_suit.team_philosophy: All content must be intellectually clear and well-reasoned

art_direction.energy_signature: Mental clarity, logical precision, clear understanding

pentacles_suit.team_philosophy: All content must have tangible, practical real-world value

art_direction.energy_signature: Practical wisdom, material abundance, grounded manifestation

continuous_improvement.user_feedback_integration: Real-time quality updates based on user input
continuous_improvement.cross_node_learning: Nodes share quality insights with each other
continuous_improvement.archetypal_evolution: Archetypes develop new expressions based on needs
continuous_improvement.community_skill_building: Help users become better quality assessors

free_forever_guarantee.no_paywalls: All Cathedral content remains forever free to access
free_forever_guarantee.open_source_methods: All creation methods are taught and shared openly
free_forever_guarantee.community_ownership: Content belongs to the commons, not any individual
free_forever_guarantee.educational_focus: Every piece teaches users to create their own versions
free_forever_guarantee.quality_without_cost: Phenomenal quality is never held hostage by pricing

enforcement_mechanisms.community_fork_rights: Community can fork if freedom is threatened
enforcement_mechanisms.open_source_validation: All code and methods remain open and auditable
